data.name: Death Duel VR
data.detailed_description:
How Does Game Work


Starting Up:
New player start with no weapon and no armor, after few matches with fists fighting, player will reach Tier 1 which is the minimum tier required to access Armoury Board.

Progressing:
Player will gain xp and credit points from each match either win or lose. XP is required to level up to higher tier to gain access of higher Tier of weapons and armors. Credit points are needed to buy the accessible weapons.

Match System:
In Tier Match, player can only join games hosted by player with same or higher tier.
In Free Match, no restriction on Tier which mean more xp and credit point for lower Tier players.

Combat System:
Physics: weapons will clash and slide on each other, so once weapon slides it is dynamic where it will land eventually, so try to make sure opponents' weapon to slide AWAY FROM you not CLOSE TO you in any clashing scenario.

Damage: Only Head and Body damage will kill a player. Damage on limbs will only cripple them, player with crippled arms can still slam the flail-like arms to do brawling damage. Player will fall flat on the ground and become immobile with crippled leg, and this is a good time to finish him off.

Anti-Spamming System: All attacks need to swing a reasonable distance with certain impact velocity to register damage. Wiggling weapons won't do No Damage.

Armour: Offers sectional protection which mean helmet only protects head, chest armour only protects torso, and etc. Armours provides best protection again cutting/slashing, poor protection against stabbing, and worst protection against blunt weapon.

Weapon: Hitting on the edge of the blade will do cutting damage, on the pointy tip of the weapon will do stabbing damage, on the flat side the blade will only do minimum basic damage. Generally, hand guard and hilt of two-handed weapons can do some blunt damage, the bigger weapon, the higher blunt damage. For example, a player with armored forearms will take extremely long time to cripple them by simply cutting and slashing, try hit armour with hilt or hand guard to do higher damage but risk is also higher.


Game Status;
Game is still in WIP, only three maps and one warrior is accessible for both Playtest and Demo. More will be coming.

To report bugs please post them on Discord where I answer questions most of time.
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/RPMNvr49cu

Demo Version: Now three selected weapons are provided immediately on the Weapon Table, so that new player can get a quick taste of sword clashing and sliding in multiplayer at no delay. Armoury is locked though, to get more experience and more updated contents in the future please feel free to opt into Playtest.

data.short_description: Death Duel VR is a physics-based PVP only game in medieval background. Meet with other players online by hosting or joining a match. Level up your warrior to gain access to more weapons and armors, and unlock more maps and play mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
